import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-courses', templateUrl: './add-courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-courses.component.css'] }) export class AddCoursesComponent { courses = new FormGroup({ name:new FormControl(''), code:new FormControl(''), pre:new FormControl(''), dept:new FormControl('') }); addCourses() { } }
